name: Format\CoverArt
description: The object for specifying cover art that is required for an article to be considered for inclusion in the Featured Stories section.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL of the image file.

properties.name: accessibilityCaption
properties.description: A caption that describes the content of the cover image. The accessibilityCaption is used by VoiceOver for iOS.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of cover art provided. Currently, image is supported.
